sentences.english: Ling is a reluctant to see red fruits jie who, in the heart very length is not happy.

sentences.english: To evaluate the time effect on mechanical properties of orthodontic arch wires.

sentences.english: Conclusion Depending on ability of adjusting the period of reproduction they can make adaptation successfully.
sentences.chinese: 结论依靠主动调整生育期长短的能力顺利完成生活史。

sentences.english: Life is measured by thought and action, not by time. (John Lubbock)
sentences.chinese: 人生的意义要以思想和行为来衡量，而非生命之长短。

sentences.english: For men, relationship happiness was directly proportional to the length of a relationship.
sentences.chinese: 对男性来说，交往愉悦程度直接与交往的长短成正比。
心胸狭小的人道人长短。

sentences.english: You can also talk about your working hours and how long you work.
sentences.chinese: 你还可以谈论工作的时数和工作时间的长短。

sentences.english: Always require that your child wear a bike helmet, no matter how long or short the ride is.
sentences.chinese: 通常规定不管骑车时间长短，你的孩子都要戴上头盔。

sentences.english: Fluvial systems are extremely susceptible to a range of environmental factors.
sentences.chinese: 河流系统长短常容易受到一系列的环境因素。

sentences.english: Kirsch says that any exercise is beneficial, no matter how little.

sentences.english: Want, go countryside or mountain go, hear in the South.

sentences.english: The are of the couple curve of the mechanism is made use of to control the length of dwell time.

sentences.english: An adjustable strap allows you to comfortably adjust the mask to fit your face.

definition: thick and thin/coarse and fine/thickness (caliber)/coarseness/quality of work
dimension/magnitude/size/measurement/large and small/at any rate/adults and children/consideration of seniority
to favor one and discriminate against the other (abbr. for 厚此薄彼[hou4 ci3 bo2 bi3])

height/altitude (aviation)/pitch (music)/ups and downs (success or failure)/whether sth is right or wrong/comparative strength, weight, depth, stature/(spoken interjection) anyway, whatever/eventually, in the end
relative superiority (better or worse, stronger or weaker, above or below etc)
strong or weak/intensity/amount of force or pressure
severity (of the case)/degree of seriousness/whether sth is slight or serious
deep or shallow/depth (of the sea)/limits of decorum
gap/interval/compartment/to divide/to separate/to leave a gap of (two weeks, three meters etc)
